tweet: The men and women who served during the Vietnam War are often overlooked. As a partner of the @vietnamwar50th, I am committed to recognizing the service of Vietnam veterans today & every day.#PA17 #VietnamWarVeteransDay  https://tinyurl.com/y4mnvbqs  pic.twitter.com/4SJPH7dyME

Pittsburgh’s steel industry built our country & we are home to many proud @steelworkers. Today’s bipartisan #SteelHearing affirmed the importance of American-made steel and demonstrated the need to invest in our country’s aging infrastructure. #PA17 pic.twitter.com/lRoTXMKzel

PA has more than half a million manufacturing jobs that are critical to our economy. Today @HouseScience welcomed experts who are driving innovation in this sector and discussed the need to fill 3.5 million high-skilled jobs over the next 10 years. #PA17 pic.twitter.com/SXWCsWuydk
